product_desc:
Green Agro Products Ltd will produce high quality coconut and products derived from coconut. The company’s goal is to cultivate large scale coconut plantation to be able to produce derived products to be marketed worldwide. 

The company will develop world class technologically advanced farming practices and build 

Green Agro Products Ltd will provide end to end processing of coconut including but not limited to coco water, peat, husk and husk carbon.

The plantation would also be interplannted with other crops to maximise the returns on the land.
name: Green Agro
